item.title: MoonLake Immunotherapeutics Stock Draws Wall Street Attention Post Monday’s Plunge: Retail Sees Significant Upside
item.description: Needham analyst Serge Belanger lowered the firm's price target on the stock to $20 from $66 but kept a ‘Buy’ rating on the shares.

item.title: Wolfspeed, CoreWeave, UiPath, DraftKings, Firefly Aerospace: Stocks Making The Biggest Moves Today
item.description: Wolfspeed’s shares were up more than 41% during Tuesday’s afternoon session after the company announced that it had exited Chapter 11 bankruptcy.

item.title: Nvidia’s Market Cap Crosses $4.5 Trillion As AI Momentum Gains Pace
item.description: The stock has been gaining momentum as the company expands its role in artificial intelligence infrastructure through partnerships and investments.

item.title: Meta Acquires Rivos To Accelerate AI Chip Development: Report
item.description: According to a report by Bloomberg, Meta’s internal chip development has not progressed as quickly as CEO Mark Zuckerberg would have liked.
